schema.help: Number of seconds to wait for a completed status.
schema.title: Wait

from_formats.title: From Formats
from_formats.description: Input format(s) to convert from. String or list of strings. Allowed values: docx, pptx, html, image, pdf, asciidoc, md, csv, xlsx, xml_uspto, xml_jats, json_docling. Optional, defaults to all formats.

to_formats.title: To Formats
to_formats.description: Output format(s) to convert to. String or list of strings. Allowed values: md, json, html, html_split_page, text, doctags. Optional, defaults to Markdown.

image_export_mode.description: Image export mode for the document (in case of JSON, Markdown or HTML). Allowed values: placeholder, embedded, referenced. Optional, defaults to Embedded.

do_ocr.title: Do Ocr
do_ocr.description: If enabled, the bitmap content will be processed using OCR. Boolean. Optional, defaults to true

force_ocr.title: Force Ocr
force_ocr.description: If enabled, replace existing text with OCR-generated text over content. Boolean. Optional, defaults to false.

ocr_engine.description: The OCR engine to use. String. Allowed values: easyocr, ocrmac, rapidocr, tesserocr, tesseract. Optional, defaults to easyocr.

ocr_lang.title: Ocr Lang
ocr_lang.description: List of languages used by the OCR engine. Note that each OCR engine has different values for the language names. String or list of strings. Optional, defaults to empty.

pdf_backend.description: The PDF backend to use. String. Allowed values: pypdfium2, dlparse_v1, dlparse_v2, dlparse_v4. Optional, defaults to dlparse_v4.

table_mode.description: Mode to use for table structure, String. Allowed values: fast, accurate. Optional, defaults to fast.

pipeline.description: Choose the pipeline to process PDF or image files.

page_range.title: Page Range
page_range.description: Only convert a range of pages. The page number starts at 1.

document_timeout.title: Document Timeout
document_timeout.description: The timeout for processing each document, in seconds.

abort_on_error.title: Abort On Error
abort_on_error.description: Abort on error if enabled. Boolean. Optional, defaults to false.

return_as_file.title: Return As File
return_as_file.description: Return the output as a zip file (will happen anyway if multiple files are generated). Boolean. Optional, defaults to false.

do_table_structure.title: Do Table Structure
do_table_structure.description: If enabled, the table structure will be extracted. Boolean. Optional, defaults to true.

include_images.title: Include Images
include_images.description: If enabled, images will be extracted from the document. Boolean. Optional, defaults to true.

images_scale.title: Images Scale
images_scale.description: Scale factor for images. Float. Optional, defaults to 2.0.

md_page_break_placeholder.title: Md Page Break Placeholder
md_page_break_placeholder.description: Add this placeholder betweek pages in the markdown output.

do_code_enrichment.title: Do Code Enrichment
do_code_enrichment.description: If enabled, perform OCR code enrichment. Boolean. Optional, defaults to false.

do_formula_enrichment.title: Do Formula Enrichment
do_formula_enrichment.description: If enabled, perform formula OCR, return LaTeX code. Boolean. Optional, defaults to false.

do_picture_classification.title: Do Picture Classification
do_picture_classification.description: If enabled, classify pictures in documents. Boolean. Optional, defaults to false.

do_picture_description.title: Do Picture Description
do_picture_description.description: If enabled, describe pictures in documents. Boolean. Optional, defaults to false.

picture_description_area_threshold.title: Picture Description Area Threshold
picture_description_area_threshold.description: Minimum percentage of the area for a picture to be processed with the models.

picture_description_local.title: Picture Description Local
picture_description_local.description: Options for running a local vision-language model in the picture description. The parameters refer to a model hosted on Hugging Face. This parameter is mutually exclusive with picture_description_api.
examples: {"repo_id": "ibm-granite/granite-vision-3.2-2b", "prompt": "Describe this image in a few sentences.", "generation_config": {"max_new_tokens": 200, "do_sample": false}}
{"repo_id": "HuggingFaceTB/SmolVLM-256M-Instruct", "prompt": "Describe this image in a few sentences.", "generation_config": {"max_new_tokens": 200, "do_sample": false}}

picture_description_api.title: Picture Description Api
picture_description_api.description: API details for using a vision-language model in the picture description. This parameter is mutually exclusive with picture_description_local.
examples: {"url": "http://localhost:11434/v1/chat/completions", "headers": {}, "params": {"model": "granite3.2-vision:2b"}, "timeout": 20.0, "prompt": "Describe this image in a few sentences."}

ChartBar.title: ChartBar
ChartBar.description:
Represents a bar in a bar chart.

Attributes:
    label (str): The label for the bar.
    values (float): The value associated with the bar.

ChartLine.title: ChartLine
ChartLine.description:
Represents a line in a line chart.

Attributes:
    label (str): The label for the line.
    values (List[Tuple[float, float]]): A list of (x, y) coordinate pairs
        representing the line's data points.

ChartPoint.title: ChartPoint
ChartPoint.description:
Represents a point in a scatter chart.

Attributes:
    value (Tuple[float, float]): A (x, y) coordinate pair representing a point in a
        chart.

ChartSlice.title: ChartSlice
ChartSlice.description:
Represents a slice in a pie chart.

Attributes:
    label (str): The label for the slice.
    value (float): The value represented by the slice.

ChartStackedBar.title: ChartStackedBar
ChartStackedBar.description:
Represents a stacked bar in a stacked bar chart.

Attributes:
    label (List[str]): The labels for the stacked bars. Multiple values are stored
        in cases where the chart is "double stacked," meaning bars are stacked both
        horizontally and vertically.
    values (List[Tuple[str, int]]): A list of values representing different segments
        of the stacked bar along with their label.

base64_string.title: Base64 String
base64_string.description: Content of the file serialized in base64. For example it can be obtained via `base64 -w 0 /path/to/file/pdf-to-convert.pdf`.

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: Additional headers used to fetch the urls, e.g. authorization, agent, etc

InputFormat.title: InputFormat
InputFormat.description: A document format supported by document backend parsers.

PictureBarChartData.title: PictureBarChartData
PictureBarChartData.description:
Represents data of a bar chart.

Attributes:
    kind (Literal["bar_chart_data"]): The type of the chart.
    x_axis_label (str): The label for the x-axis.
    y_axis_label (str): The label for the y-axis.
    bars (List[ChartBar]): A list of bars in the chart.

url.title: Url
url.description: Endpoint which accepts openai-api compatible requests.

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: Headers used for calling the API endpoint. For example, it could include authentication headers.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Prompt used when calling the vision-language model.
prompt.default: Describe this image in a few sentences.
examples: Describe this image in a few sentences.
This is a figures from a document. Provide a detailed description of it.

repo_id.title: Repo Id
repo_id.description: Repository id from the Hugging Face Hub.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Prompt used when calling the vision-language model.
prompt.default: Describe this image in a few sentences.
examples: Describe this image in a few sentences.
This is a figure from a document. Provide a detailed description of it.

PictureLineChartData.title: PictureLineChartData
PictureLineChartData.description:
Represents data of a line chart.

Attributes:
    kind (Literal["line_chart_data"]): The type of the chart.
    x_axis_label (str): The label for the x-axis.
    y_axis_label (str): The label for the y-axis.
    lines (List[ChartLine]): A list of lines in the chart.

PicturePieChartData.title: PicturePieChartData
PicturePieChartData.description:
Represents data of a pie chart.

Attributes:
    kind (Literal["pie_chart_data"]): The type of the chart.
    slices (List[ChartSlice]): A list of slices in the pie chart.

PictureScatterChartData.title: PictureScatterChartData
PictureScatterChartData.description:
Represents data of a scatter chart.

Attributes:
    kind (Literal["scatter_chart_data"]): The type of the chart.
    x_axis_label (str): The label for the x-axis.
    y_axis_label (str): The label for the y-axis.
    points (List[ChartPoint]): A list of points in the scatter chart.

PictureStackedBarChartData.title: PictureStackedBarChartData
PictureStackedBarChartData.description:
Represents data of a stacked bar chart.

Attributes:
    kind (Literal["stacked_bar_chart_data"]): The type of the chart.
    x_axis_label (str): The label for the x-axis.
    y_axis_label (str): The label for the y-axis.
    stacked_bars (List[ChartStackedBar]): A list of stacked bars in the chart.

PictureTabularChartData.title: PictureTabularChartData
PictureTabularChartData.description:
Base class for picture chart data.

Attributes:
    title (str): The title of the chart.
    chart_data (TableData): Chart data in the table format.
